NIYAMR AI – 48-Hour Full-Stack Developer Assignment (Super Simple)  Your Task:  Build a very simple web app that checks a PDF using LLM logic.  The app should do only 3 things:  1) Upload a PDF  User uploads any PDF (2–10 pages).  2) User Enters 3 Easy Rules  Examples:  - “The document must have a purpose section.”  - “The document must mention at least one date.”  - “The document must define at least one term.”  - “The document must mention who is responsible.”  - “The document must list any requirements.”  These are the type of rules your app must understand.  3) App Checks the PDF Using an LLM  For each rule, your app should:  - Ask an LLM (any model you choose)  - Decide: PASS or FAIL  - Show 1 evidence sentence  - Show short reasoning  - Show confidence score (0–100)  Example Output:  {  "rule": "Document must mention a date.",  "status": "pass",
"evidence": "Found in page 1: 'Published 2024'",  "reasoning": "Document includes a publication year.",  "confidence": 92  }  What to Build:  Frontend:  - Upload PDF button  - 3 text inputs for rules  - “Check Document” button  - Table showing results  Backend:  - Extract text from PDF  - Send text + rules to an LLM  - Return PASS/FAIL + evidence + reasoning + confidence  Deliverables (48 hours):  1. GitHub Repo (frontend + backend)  2. README with instructions  3. One screenshot of the working UI
